TextLang.Text: A connection error has occurred. The WLAN switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. The WIRELESS switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred.
Please wait...
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the access point.
Password
A connection error has occurred. The signal may be weak.
A connection error has occurred. Please try again.
Connection to the server failed. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
Currently, the server may be down for maintenance or updating. Please try again later.
A system software update for the PSP™ system is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] to update the system.
Sign in to PlayStation®Network.
Sign-In ID (E-mail Address)
Save Password
Sign In
Sign In Automatically (Auto Sign-In)
Signing in... Please wait.
The sign-in ID (e-mail address) or password is incorrect.
The connection with PlayStation®Network timed out.
PlayStation®Network is closed.
PlayStation®Network is currently undergoing maintenance.
PlayStation®Network is busy. Try to sign in again later.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
An error has occurred. You have been signed out of PlayStation®Network.
You cannot sign in using another user's sign-in ID (e-mail address).
Forgot your password?
To sign in, you must accept the Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy again.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network.

You must ask the holder of the associated master account to help you sign in.
＜Note to parent or guardian＞ For the sub account holder to sign in, you must accept the Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy again using your master account.

Your password is no longer valid. Please sign in to PlayStation®Network on your PS3™ system, or from the following website if using a PC, and then change your password. https://store.playstation.com/login.gvm
Access to PlayStation®Network by this account has been banned or temporarily suspended.
Access to PlayStation®Network from this system has been banned or temporarily suspended.
This operation is not available here. For details, visit the following website on your PC: http://pc.playstation.net/
